channel.title: Unhiding Files
channel.description: Ok so the client I have I need to unhide the files. All that is currently in it is run so I need to get the files so I can change the ip so is there a program to this or what?

item.title: Unhiding Files
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

If you are trying to hide these files from your users for your client thats not going to cut it. You dont need the java files to run the client, Just make a backup of your java files to the client and delete them in the one you are going to give your users. Just make sure you leave the class files.

Read full topic

item.title: Unhiding Files
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:3, topic:340961”]Control Panel> Folder Options> View> Show Hidden Files and Folders

Go into the client and right click any file that shows there and uncheck ‘Hidden’

Edit: Sorry wohunyia I was typing that message just as you sent it :rolleyes:[/quote]
great minds must think a like ;DD

Read full topic

item.title: Unhiding Files
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

O that worked. Thanks very much

Read full topic

item.title: Unhiding Files
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Control Panel> Folder Options> View> Show Hidden Files and Folders

Go into the client and right click any file that shows there and uncheck ‘Hidden’

Edit: Sorry wohunyia I was typing that message just as you sent it :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Unhiding Files
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

un hide?? if you mean that you have hidden them in “right click -> properties -> hide” then go to control panel/ folder options" press “view” bar and there will a selection “hidden files and folders” and chose “show hidden files and folders” .
If you used something to hide it like a program then you have to yous the same program to unhide them ;D

Read full topic
